org.apache.flink.runtime.akka

类 FlinkUntypedActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.FlinkUntypedActor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor
    直接已知子类:
    FlinkResourceManager, JobClientActor

    public abstract class FlinkUntypedActor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    Base class for Flink's actors implemented with Java. Actors inheriting from this class automatically log received messages when the debug log level is activated. Furthermore, they filter out JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage with the wrong leader session ID. If a message of type RequiresLeaderSessionID without being wrapped in a LeaderSessionMessage is detected, then an Exception is thrown.

    In order to implement the actor behavior, an implementing subclass has to override the method handleMessage, which defines how messages are processed. Furthermore, the subclass has to provide a leader session ID option which is returned by getLeaderSessionID.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • onReceive

        public final void onReceive(java.lang.Object message)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called by Akka if a new message has arrived for the actor. It logs the processing time of the incoming message if the logging level is set to debug. After logging the handleLeaderSessionID method is called.

        Important: This method cannot be overriden. The actor specific message handling logic is implemented by the method handleMessage.

        指定者:
        onReceive 在类中 akka.actor.UntypedActor
        参数:
        message - Incoming message
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • handleLeaderSessionID

        private void handleLeaderSessionID(java.lang.Object message)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method filters out JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage whose leader session ID is not equal to the actors leader session ID. If a message of type RequiresLeaderSessionID arrives, then an Exception is thrown, because these messages have to be wrapped in a JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage.
        参数:
        message - Incoming message
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • handleDiscardedMessage

        private void handleDiscardedMessage(java.util.UUID expectedLeaderSessionID,
                                    org.apache.flink.runtime.messages.JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage msg)

      • handleNoLeaderId

        private void handleNoLeaderId(org.apache.flink.runtime.messages.JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage msg)

      • handleMessage

        protected abstract void handleMessage(java.lang.Object message)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method contains the actor logic which defines how to react to incoming messages.
        参数:
        message - Incoming message
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getLeaderSessionID

        protected abstract java.util.UUID getLeaderSessionID()
        Returns the current leader session ID associcated with this actor.
        返回:

      • decorateMessage

        protected java.lang.Object decorateMessage(java.lang.Object message)
        This method should be called for every outgoing message. It wraps messages which require a leader session ID (indicated by RequiresLeaderSessionID) in a JobManagerMessages.LeaderSessionMessage with the actor's leader session ID.

        This method can be overriden to implement a different decoration behavior.

        参数:
        message - Message to be decorated
        返回:
        The deocrated message
